title: CIs do not appear in Service Management when UCMDB multi-tenancy is enabled
content:
Some CIs don’t appear in Service Management.

Cause

For nodes that are discovered by the Data Flow Probe, the default value of the field Consumer Tenants is [System Default Tenant]. In this case, these CIs don’t appear in Service Management.

Solution

Ensure that you assign the correct tenant to the Consumer Tenants field. To make a CI publicly available, choose the “All Tenants” value. 

To do this, you can set enrichment rules in each UCMDB customer so each CI can have a proper UCMDB consumer tenant.
